sourcesContent:
Nueva Factura

Producto Precio Unitario Cantidad Imagen Total
{{calculateTotalForProduct(producto)}}
{{calculateSubtotal()}}
{{calculateTaxes()}}
{{calculateTotal()}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-invoice', templateUrl: './create-invoice.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-invoice.component.css'] }) export class CreateInvoiceComponent { fixedProducts: FixedProduct[] = [ { id: 1, name: 'Product 1', unitPrice: 5000, imageUrl: 'path_to_image_product1.png', }, { id: 2, name: 'Product 2', unitPrice: 10000, imageUrl: 'path_to_image_product2.png', }, { id: 3, name: 'Product 3', unitPrice: 7000, imageUrl: 'path_to_image_product3.png', }, // Add more fixed products as needed ]; cartProducts: CartProduct[] = []; selectedProductId: number | null = null; addProductToCart() { // Implement logic to add a product from the fixed products to the cart if (this.selectedProductId !== null) { const existingProduct = this.cartProducts.find(product => product.id === this.selectedProductId); if (existingProduct) { // If the product already exists in the cart, increase its quantity existingProduct.quantity++; } else { // If the product is not in the cart, add it with a quantity of 1 this.cartProducts.push({ id: this.selectedProductId, quantity: 1 }); } } } calculateSubtotal() { // Calculate subtotal based on products in the cart let subtotal = 0; for (const cartProduct of this.cartProducts) { const fixedProduct = this.fixedProducts.find(product => product.id === cartProduct.id); if (fixedProduct) { subtotal += fixedProduct.unitPrice * cartProduct.quantity; } } return subtotal; } calculateTaxes() { return this.calculateSubtotal() * 0.19; } calculateTotal() { return this.calculateSubtotal() + this.calculateTaxes(); } saveInvoice() { // Implement logic to save the invoice // You can send the invoice data to a server or perform any necessary actions here } } // Define an interface for fixed products interface FixedProduct { id: number; name: string; unitPrice: number, imageUrl: string; } // Define an interface for products in the cart interface CartProduct { id: number; quantity: number; }
